item.title: Skip List Data Structure - Explained!
item.author: sam.sumitkumar@gmail.com (Sumit Kumar)
item.description: Why am I writing about Skip Lists? Skip List is one of those data structures that I have seen briefly mentioned in academic books; but never seen it being used in academic or industrial projects (or in LeetCode questions ðŸ™‚ ). However I was pleasantly surprised to see Skip List being one of the major contributors behind Twitter’s recent success in reducing their search indexing latency by more than 90% (absolute).
